    • getPostionsToSave

      protected Set<Position> getPostionsToSave()
      Method to retrieve positions to be saved. If the 'positionsToSave' controller exists in the Warehouse instance, it is returned. Otherwise, a set of positions is created from the combination of 'bestLowPositions' and 'bestTallPositions' controllers, and stored in the 'positionsToSave' controller for future use.
      Returns:
      A set of positions to be saved.
